metadata.title: CVE-2021-43999 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Guacamole 1.2.0 and 1.3.0 do not properly validate responsesreceived from a SAML identity provider. If SAML support is enabled, thismay allow a malicious user to assume the identity of another Guacamoleuser.

criterions.comment: guacamole-server package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
